# Claude Code Research

Deep research into Claude Code configurations, workflows, hooks, and community best practices.

## Mission

Extract every valuable pattern, technique, and configuration from the Claude Code ecosystem to build the ultimate Claude Code setup.

## Structure

```
Claude-Code/
├── data/repos/              # Cloned repositories
│   ├── awesome-claude-code/
│   ├── everything-claude-code/
│   ├── claude-code-hooks-mastery/
│   └── ... (9 repos total)
├── extracted/               # Deep analysis of each repo
├── by_pattern/              # Cross-repo pattern extraction
│   ├── hooks/
│   ├── skills/
│   ├── agents/
│   ├── commands/
│   └── mcp/
├── synthesized/             # Aggregated insights
├── timeline/                # Development timeline
└── reports/                 # Actionable outputs
```
